parameters.name: HostShareKeyId
parameters.description:
The shared key ID.

>  You can call the [ListHostShareKeys](~~462973~~) operation to query the shared key ID.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description:
The bastion host ID.

>  You can call the [DescribeInstances](~~153281~~) operation to query the bastion host ID.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Default value: **10**.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the bastion host.

>  For more information about the mapping between region IDs and region names, see [Regions and zones](~~40654~~).
